ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mean mean nasty Maestro
ygData.msgSnippet: nothing (until RoK) can possibly compare to a duel-wielding Dojorn.  we ve killed everything in this game many times over, and we have never faced anything
ygData.messageBody:
nothing (until RoK) can possibly compare to a duel-wielding Dojorn. we've
killed everything in this game many times over, and we have never faced
anything nearly as difficult than when Dojo was duel-wielding. now that was
a challenge and a lot of fun (and the first and last time i was in sky, i
usually never have the time to put in up there). the only thing that killed
me faster (sitting and singing is not a good idea when he gets pulled, ok so
i wasn't paying attention i got a 1 1/2 year old) than Dojo that night was
when i got a pull of 12 buggy guardians at phin. not that Inno's a
cakewalk, but i am going with DW Dojo as the toughest =)

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L49 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Combined with his
> AE lifetap and buggy pathing, he was actually harder than
> Innoruuk (who is widely regarded as the most difficult
> god/dragon at the moment).
